vega.uplink.pointing

Class Ptr

  • java.lang.Object
    • MapContext
      • vega.uplink.pointing.Ptr

  • public class Ptr
extends MapContext
    Class to represent both PTR and PTSL PTRs can contain only one segment, PTSLs may contain several segments
